mapper.select:
SELECT equipName,MAX(oneNum) as oneNum,MAX(twoNum) as twoNum FROM ( SELECT devName as equipName,
(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='08:00:00' THEN max(ALTPID) END) AS oneNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='14:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS twoNum
(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='20:00:00' THEN max(ALTPID) END) AS oneNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='00:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS twoNum
from dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME="${team}"
AND ROUTE_NAME='皮带岗' AND devName !='石灰溜槽' AND devName !='石灰搅拌桶'
AND ROUTE_NAME='浮选路线' AND(ZONE_NAME='一段工艺' OR ZONE_NAME='二段工艺')
AND TASKSTART_TM >= concat("${time}", ' ', '08:00:00') AND concat("${time}", ' ', '20:00:00') >TASKSTART_TM
AND TASKSTART_TM >= concat("${time}", ' ', '20:00:00') AND concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_sub("${time}",interval -1 day),'%Y-%m-%d'),' ', '08:00:00') >TASKSTART_TM
GROUP BY equipName,DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s') )as m GROUP BY FIELD(equipName,'1#中重型板式给矿机','2#中重型板式给矿机','5#皮带运输机','1#石灰泵','2#石灰泵','石灰分配器')

SELECT equipName,MAX(oneNum) as oneNum,MAX(twoNum) as twoNum FROM ( SELECT (CASE WHEN devName='原矿4.5m搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='矿浆浓度' THEN '一段浓度（%）' WHEN devName='原矿4.5m搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='矿浆细度' THEN '一段细度（%）' WHEN devName='原矿4.5m搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='矿浆pH值' THEN '一段pH值（ml/PH）' WHEN devName='再磨4m搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='矿浆浓度' THEN '二段浓度（%）' WHEN devName='再磨4m搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='矿浆细度' THEN '二段细度（%）' WHEN devName='再磨4m搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='矿浆pH值' THEN '二段pH值（ml/PH）' WHEN devName='2#选硫搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='矿浆浓度' THEN '选硫浓度（%）' WHEN devName='2#选硫搅拌桶' AND SC_PART='矿浆pH值' THEN '选硫pH值（ml/PH）' ELSE devName END)as equipName,
(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='08:00:00' THEN max(ALTPID) END) AS oneNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='14:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS twoNum
(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='20:00:00' THEN max(ALTPID) END) AS oneNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='00:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS twoNum
from dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='磨浮生产' AND ROUTE_NAME='浮选路线' AND(ZONE_NAME='一段工艺' OR ZONE_NAME='二段工艺') AND SC_PART !='搅拌桶' -- 白班、页面时间划分
AND TASKSTART_TM >= concat("${time}", ' ', '08:00:00') AND concat("${time}", ' ', '20:00:00') >TASKSTART_TM
AND TASKSTART_TM >= concat("${time}", ' ', '20:00:00') AND concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_sub("${time}",interval -1 day),'%Y-%m-%d'),' ', '08:00:00') >TASKSTART_TM
GROUP BY equipName,DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s') )as m GROUP BY FIELD(equipName,'一段浓度（%）','一段细度（%）','一段pH值（ml/PH）','二段浓度（%）','二段细度（%）','二段pH值（ml/PH）','选硫浓度（%）','选硫pH值（ml/PH）')

SELECT equipName,MAX(oneNum) as oneNum,MAX(twoNum) as twoNum FROM ( SELECT (CASE WHEN ROUTE_NAME='浮选底层' THEN ZONE_NAME ELSE ROUTE_NAME END) equipName,
(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='08:00:00' THEN max(ALTPID) END) AS oneNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='14:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS twoNum
(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='20:00:00' THEN max(ALTPID) END) AS oneNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='00:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS twoNum
from dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='磨浮生产'
AND (ROUTE_NAME='浮选柱'
OR ROUTE_NAME='浮选路线'
OR ROUTE_NAME='浮选底层'
OR ROUTE_NAME='鼓风机')
AND TASKSTART_TM >= concat("${time}", ' ', '08:00:00') AND concat("${time}", ' ', '20:00:00') >TASKSTART_TM
AND TASKSTART_TM >= concat("${time}", ' ', '20:00:00') AND concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_sub("${time}",interval -1 day),'%Y-%m-%d'),' ', '08:00:00') >TASKSTART_TM
GROUP BY equipName,DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s') )as m GROUP BY FIELD(equipName,'浮选底层区域一','浮选底层区域二','浮选底层区域三','浮选路线','鼓风机','浮选柱')

SELECT equipName,MAX(oneNum) as oneNum,MAX(twoNum) as twoNum FROM ( SELECT (CASE WHEN devName='MQY2745高低压稀油润滑系统' THEN 'MQY2745再磨机稀油站' WHEN devName='MQY4870高低压稀油润滑系统' THEN 'MQY4870球磨机稀油站' WHEN devName='MZS6433高压稀油润滑系统' THEN 'MZS6433半自磨机高压油站' WHEN devName='MZS6433低压稀油润滑系统' THEN 'MZS6433半自磨机低压油站' WHEN devName='1#离心式渣浆泵（粗砂）' THEN '1#粗砂泵' WHEN devName='2#离心式渣浆泵（粗砂）' THEN '2#粗砂泵' WHEN devName='1#离心式渣浆泵（再磨砂）' THEN '1#再磨砂泵' WHEN devName='2#离心式渣浆泵（再磨砂）' THEN '2#再磨砂泵' ELSE devName END) as equipName,
(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='08:00:00' THEN max(ALTPID) END) AS oneNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='14:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS twoNum
(CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='20:00:00' THEN max(ALTPID) END) AS oneNum, (CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s')='00:00:00' THEN Max(ALTPID) END) AS twoNum
from dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='磨浮生产' AND( ( ROUTE_NAME='磨矿岗'AND devName!='球磨机结构') OR( ROUTE_NAME='浮选底层' AND ZONE_NAME='浮选底层区域三' AND devName LIKE '%（再磨砂）'))
AND TASKSTART_TM >= concat("${time}", ' ', '08:00:00') AND concat("${time}", ' ', '20:00:00') >TASKSTART_TM
AND TASKSTART_TM >= concat("${time}", ' ', '20:00:00') AND concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_sub("${time}",interval -1 day),'%Y-%m-%d'),' ', '08:00:00') >TASKSTART_TM
GROUP BY equipName,DATE_FORMAT(TASKSTART_TM,'%H:%i:%s') )as m GROUP BY FIELD(equipName,'MZS6433半自磨机','MQY4870球磨机','MQY2745再磨机','MZS6433半自磨机低压油站','MZS6433半自磨机高压油站' ,'MQY4870球磨机稀油站','MQY2745再磨机稀油站','1#粗砂泵','2#粗砂泵','1#再磨砂泵','2#再磨砂泵','FX660-GT旋流器（A组）','FX660-GT旋流器（B组）','FX350-GT旋流器')
